text: Hi Shahana! I'm Alex and I'm currently studying Chemical Engineering. I finished my 2nd year in June and and now on a placement year doing research and development. I will then be back at uni for another 2 years to complete my masters! I'm glad you know what you're passionate about and interested in! Do you have any specific area of chemistry which you enjoy the most? And do you have any idea what your plans are for the future with regards to university or your career?
Also if there's anything you're curious about with regards to university or working life then hopefully I can help with that too!
